content: s not perfect as the fur covers any mistakes if you ve never surface crocheted before make sure to take your time and try not to let your hook come off the yarn as it can be tricky to find again here s a video tutorial showing how to surface crochet move the arms and legs out https //www youtube com/ of your way as you go and watch v=grljji5p5u0 remember you can bend them to sit where you want to make it easier after completing the body continue from the magic_ring at the top of the head and work in spirals down to the neck starting at the top helps the fur lie upwards which gives the orangutan it s pointy hair move on to the arms and legs starting at the body and ending at the wrists/ankles be sure not to accidentally connect the arms or legs to the body as this will prevent movement i like to continue the fur over the backs of the hands and feet a little bit as well © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 20 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts after you ve completely covered your orangutan i recommend going over it with a needle to pull out any fibres that are caught in the stitches this makes the fur as dense as possible you can see a before and after of this process below before after finally take a comb and scissors and give him a haircut you can trim however you like i like to trim around the belly and face so that the hairs aren t lying over the grey areas and especially in front of the ears and around the hands and feet so that they re more visible © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 21 hannah bickerstaff - @hannahb_crafts congratulations enjoy your completed orangutan © 2021 hb crafts all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only 22
